    • Uses of StreamableResource in org.apache.creadur.whisker.app.load

      Subclasses of StreamableResource in org.apache.creadur.whisker.app.load 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  StreamableClassPathResource
      Streams, on demand, the contents of a resource located on the class path.
      class  StreamableFileNameResource
      Streams, on demand, the contents of a file identified by a full file name, including path.
      class  StreamableFileResource
      Streams the contents of a file.
      Methods in org.apache.creadur.whisker.app.load that return StreamableResource 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      StreamableResource StreamableResourceFactory.streamFromClassPathResource(String name)
      Builds instance that streams, on demand, from resource on the class path.
      StreamableResource StreamableResourceFactory.streamFromFileResource(File file)
      Builds instance that streams, on demand, from resource stored in the file system.
      StreamableResource StreamableResourceFactory.streamFromFileResource(String fileName)
      Builds instance that streams, on demand, from resource stored in the file system.
      StreamableResource StreamableResourceFactory.streamFromResource(String resourceName)
      When the resource is found on the classpath, builds an instance that streams, on demand, from the classpath.
